headline: Jim Cramer on Pepsi: “You Let That Dividend Compound Over Time”
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. Cramer called it a “premier growth company” and said: “I know PepsiCo’s never going to be up 100 points in one day, but if you’re building a diversified portfolio of mostly growth stocks, as you should, you can do a lot worse […]

headline: Does Elliott’s $4B Stake Signal Value in PepsiCo After Double Digit Slide?
summary: Thinking about what to do with PepsiCo stock? You are definitely not alone. With shares recently closing at $143.53 and down 4.4% year-to-date, investors are weighing their next move, especially after a rocky year that saw the stock slide nearly 16%. Whether you are a long-term holder or scoping out a new position, it is worth pausing to ask: why has PepsiCo lagged, and what does that mean for its value today? Much of the recent turbulence ties back to headline-grabbing news. Elliott...
